biography: ​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.           Marian Hall Seldes (born August 23, 1928) is an American stage, film, radio, and television actress whose career has spanned six decades and who was elected to the American Theatre Hall of Fame. name: Marian Seldes
place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
